name: The user is able to get the error message for invalid syantax
description: Given: The user is in trees page having an tryEditor with a Run button to test the code

steps.name: When  The user gets invalid input from sheet "TreepythonCode" and 1 in trees
And  The user clicks on Run button after Entering invalid python code in trees tryEditor
Then  The user should get the error message for trees
